name: The Last Frontier (vuiren)
description:
Control:

PC: Left click for choosing allies, right click to set a command. 

Android: Touching allies = selecting them, Releasing touch - sending command

Try this 2D real time straregy!

General idea - bring strategy to mobile phones. Also there isn't much 2D strategy's at all, all I can think about is Soldat and Cortex Command. Personally I believe that this genre require more attention.

For now it's a really early build it misses lot's of stuff and for now there os only one level, fortunately beateable and loseable. 

All you have to do is reach the flag

Read about buildings in attached word file.

Please leave some reviews even textless I really wanna know what you're think about this idea.

Hope you enjoy!
